amendment.description: An amendment numbered 14 printed in the Congressional Record to insert on page 53, line 24, the following: "This section shall not apply on and after any date on which the Energy Information Administration publishes data (as required by section 57 of the Federal Energy Administration Act of 1974 (15 U.S.C. 790f)) demonstrating that new imports of crude oil account for more than two-thirds of oil consumption in the U.S.

action.text: Mr. Taylor (NC) raised a point of order against the Istook amendment (A006). Mr. Taylor (NC) raised a point of order that the amendment proposed to change existing law and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
